website_summaries.verdict: A water cooler that has a simple design and is easy to set up for use around the office or home.
pros: Dual hot and cold water spouts for drinks, soups, and food
Can independently power down the hot water function to save more energy
Includes a child safety lock on the hot water button
cons: Getting the refill bottle in place can require more than one person when securing the bottle on

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: When our older (5 years old) machine started leaking, I immediately got on Amazon for a new one. I liked the Primo model so wanted the same kind. Found it easy and was so pleased with the fast delivery. I was expecting it in 5-7 days (wasnt Prime eligible) but was happy it arrived in 3 days. I can tell the difference in the new machine, the water flows much faster. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the price and the durability of this product. Purchasing elsewhere for the same model is almost double what Amazon had it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: great. we got one at work
customer_reviews.text: great. we got one at work, and i got the same for the house. super quiet, the cold water's cold, the hot is hot enough for coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Pliscou

customer_reviews.title: I bought three
customer_reviews.text: one for home, lake home and office. Handy feature on the back allows hot/cold temps to be turned on/off as I like.
customer_reviews.author: matt m.

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good, ice cold
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, ice cold, and steaming hot water. Can get a little loud at times, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: BAB

customer_reviews.title: I Love this water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without it! I had it for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M

customer_reviews.title: It came quickly as stated on the internet.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Fair price. Quick delivery. The water flows quickly and is cool.
customer_reviews.author: crawford

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this water dispenser, keeps water cold, and is a good size to fit into a relatively small area.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tuffs

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I replaced this with the same one I had for years. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Edna Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Great water dispenser. But doesn't have something to catch the water if you take the cup away too quickly. Water will go everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Gives water a chemical-ey flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dispenser for almost a year. Bought it from a local wal-mart. Every glass of water has a hint of "off gas" taste, sort of like a chemical-like flavor which is even more noticeable when using the hot water. Not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: YukonYak4life

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a stainless steel tank
customer_reviews.text: Per Primo , this model doesn't have a stainless steel water tank. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great but does leak.
customer_reviews.text: Got mine this summer from Kmart for $99 and while I do like how hot and cold the water gets, it also has begun to leak from the hole near the cold-side faucet. If I can figure out how to stop this, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shoc

customer_reviews.title: Primo Customer Service is Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a primo water dispenser 2 years ago, and the hot water heating element went bad. They offered no real warranty, customer service, or replacement service. Industry standard is a 5 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Dedalus Productions

customer_reviews.title: Very cold water, great price
customer_reviews.text: I paid $59 on sale directly from Primo. It's a really compact unit (a little short for tall people like myself). The water is quite cold. I measured it at 44 degrees F. I don't use the hot.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Cold and hot water instantly!
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for a couple months. It arrived quicker than expected. The cold water is really cold, and the hot water is really hot. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rdtoserenity

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Hot water gets really hot and is ideal for making tea. Cold water also gets very cold. Does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Oaklands

customer_reviews.title: Don't get ths one.
customer_reviews.text: Makes too much noise and water does not get very cold.
customer_reviews.author: William Feeny

product_meta.title: Primo - Easy Top Loading Water Dispenser - White - Instant Cold and Hot Water - UL/Energy Star Qualified
feature_bullets: Coupons for Primo water included - Redeemable at thousands of retail locations nationwide.
Dispenses ice-cold and piping-hot water with the push of a button. Hot water includes child-resistant safety feature.
Spill-proof bottle holder prevents spills while loading bottles of Primo water.
Removable drip tray is dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.
UL Certified and Energy Star Rated. Includes a 1-Year Limited Warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
